for _ in range(int(input())):
    (a, b) = map(int, input().split())
    count = 0
    if a % 3 == 0 or b % 3 == 0:
        print('0')
    else:
        count = 0
        while a % 3 != 0 or b % 3 != 0:
            a1 = abs(a - b)
            b1 = abs(a - b)
            a = a1
            b = b1
            count = count + 1
        print(count)

for i in range(int(input())):
    (a, b) = map(int, input().split())
    s = 0
    while a % 3 != 0 and b % 3 != 0:
        dif = abs(a - b)
        a = dif
        b = dif
        s += 1
    print(s)

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    (a, b) = map(int, input().split())
    count = 0
    if a > b:
        (a, b) = (b, a)
    while a % 3 != 0 and b % 3 != 0:
        b = abs(b - a)
        count += 1
    print(count)
    t -= 1

Test = int(input())
for Cases in range(Test):
    (IntegarA, IntegarB) = map(int, input().split())
    Count = 0
    if IntegarA % 3 == 0 or IntegarB % 3 == 0:
        print('0')
    else:
        while IntegarA % 3 != 0 or IntegarB % 3 != 0:
            IntegarAResult = abs(IntegarA - IntegarB)
            IntegarBResult = abs(IntegarA - IntegarB)
            IntegarA = IntegarAResult
            IntegarB = IntegarBResult
            Count = Count + 1
        print(Count)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (a, b) = map(int, input().split())
    count = 0
    if a == 0 or b == 0 or a % 3 == 0 or (b % 3 == 0):
        print(0)
    else:
        while a % 3 != 0 or b % 3 != 0:
            a1 = abs(a - b)
            a2 = abs(a - b)
            a = a1
            b = a2
            count += 1
        print(count)
